page.title: 03EDUCATION
page.content: TALYBONT PRIMARY SCHOOL CONT. The children of Talybont school have a choice of two Secondary schools at Aberystwyth either Penweddig School which is a Welsh medium comprehensive school or Penglais School which is an English medium comprehensive school.This year 7 of the children will enter Penweddig while 5 will enter Penglais. There is an old school at Talybont which opened in 1875 and which has a very interesting history. There were only two classrooms in the school but there was at one time over 200 pupils at the school! We moan now when there are more than 25 children in the class because of the lack of space. The old school is now used by a private school from the Midlands who use it as a base for field courses in the area.
